hibernate-mapping.sql-query: update EO_WORK_ORDER T set T.Eowo_Vamp_No = :eowoVampNo, T.EOWO_LINE_CODE = :eowoLineCode, T.EOWO_LINE_NAME = :eowoLineName, T.EOWO_MILEAGE = :eowoMileage, T.EOWO_CARRIERS_CODE = :eowoCarriersCode, T.EOWO_CARRIERS_NAME = :eowoCarriersName, T.EOWO_VAMP_DATE = :eowoVampDate where t.eowo_work_order_no in (:eowoWorkOrderNos)
